DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Inhibition Agouti-related Protein ( AgRP ) Management Obesity Weight Loss
DOC.criteria: Male female volunteer , age 18 65 year , inclusive . Subjects must obese ( class 1 : BMI 30.0 34.9 kg/m2 class 2 : BMI 35 39.9 kg/m2 nonAsians BMI 27.0 31.9 kg/m2 32.0 36.9 kg/m2 Asians ) Screening Visit . Female subject must postmenopausal ( amenorrhea least 2 year prior schedule dose confirmatory FSH test range 23116 IU/L ) surgically sterile ( physician insurance documentation bilateral tubal ligation least 6 month prior Screening Visit hysterectomy and/or bilateral oophorectomy ) agree undergo vitro fertilization study 6 month post treatment . Type 1 diabetes . Type 2 diabetes . History myocardial infarction , stroke , include transient ischemic attack , last 2 year . Asthma chronic obstructive pulmonary disease control regular use inhale steroid . Subjects rheumatoid arthritis , lupus , multiple sclerosis regularly require steroid diseasemodifying antirheumatic agent . Subjects psoriasis require oral steroid . Subjects plan undergo gastric bypass resection surgery , procedure 6 month prior Screening Visit .
